entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Fog patches developing early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
